room_title: Escape room "The Cellar" by Key Quest in Boston
room_description:
You wake up chained and bound in a dark creepy cellar. A chill runs down your spine when you realize you were captured and brought here by a psychopathic serial killer. It was all over the news for the last two months: missing people turning up quartered and brutally beaten. Can you escape your fate?
This escape room is also available at the Danvers location.
Address: 139 Endicott St., Endicott Plaza, Danvers MA, 01923.
Phone number: 978-762-8778
